topic.title: Installation Guide
topic.shortdesc: Couchbase Server installation covers pre-installation, installation on supported platforms, post-installation, upgrading, cloud deployment and migration procedures.

body.p: Installation involves picking up the platform and the correct software edition for your needs, downloading the software, and running the installer.

ul.li: Review hardware requirements, supported platforms, network configuration, security considerations, and production deployment considerations.
Follow installation instructions for your operating system or cloud environment.
